Class ListOfEnquiries

java.lang.Object
enquiry.ListOfEnquiries
public class ListOfEnquiries extends Object
Class acting as a database of enquiries

  • Method Details

    • getEnquiries

      public ArrayList<String> getEnquiries()
      Standard get method for list of enquiries
      Returns:
      List of Enquiries

    • addEnquiry

      public void addEnquiry(String enquiry, String userID, filehandler.Database database, camppackage.Camp camp)
      Standard set method to add an enquiry into list of enquiries
      Parameters:
      enquiry - Enquiry to be added
      userID - User identification for User who submitted enquiry
      database - Database of Users
      camp - Camp that received the enquiry

    • addEnquiry

      public void addEnquiry(String enquiry, String userID, filehandler.Database database, camppackage.Camp camp, int enquiryIndex, boolean isItAnswered)
      For readFromFile to add enquiry from excel sheet
      Parameters:
      enquiry - Enquiry to be added
      userID - User identification attached to the enquiry
      database - Database of Users
      camp - Camp that received the enquiry
      enquiryIndex - Unique identification for an enquiry acting as a pointer
      isItAnswered - Status of whether an enquiry is replied to or not

    • answeredEnquiry

      public void answeredEnquiry(int index)
      To update the status of an enquiry after it has been answered
      Parameters:
      index - Index positioning of enquiry that has just been answered

    • getEnquiry

      public String getEnquiry(int index, String userID)
      Get method to fetch an enquiry for a student that belong to them
      Parameters:
      index - Index positioning of enquiry in list of enquiries
      userID - User identification requesting to fetch the enquiry
      Returns:
      Enquiry if verification successful and null if verification unsuccessful

    • getEnquiry

      public String getEnquiry(int index)
      For Staff/Committee Member to fetch an enquiry
      Parameters:
      index - Index positioning of an enquiry
      Returns:
      Enquiry at that given position

    • editEnquiry

      protected void editEnquiry(int id, String userID, String newEnquiry)

      Method to edit enquiry

      Unauthorized users will not be able to edit

      Edits cannot be made after it has been answered

      UI class will be responsible for system prompt, this method does not provide system prompt

      Parameters:
      id - Unique identification number(pointer) of an enquiry
      userID - User identification of User trying to edit an enquiry
      newEnquiry - New enquiry to replace the old enquiry

    • deleteEnquiry

      protected void deleteEnquiry(int id, String userID)

      Method to delete enquiry

      Enquiry can only be deleted by enquirer and if the enquiry is not yet answered

      Parameters:
      id - Unique identification number(pointer) of an enquiry
      userID - User identification of User trying to edit an enquiry

    • getSize

      protected int getSize()
      Standard get method for size of list of enquiries
      Returns:
      Size of list of Enquiries

    • isEnquiryAnswered

      public boolean isEnquiryAnswered(int index)
      Return answered status of an enquiry given their index
      Parameters:
      index - Index positioning in list of enquriies
      Returns:
      Answered Status of an enquiry

    • getUserID

      public String getUserID(int index)
      Get method to get enquirer for a specific enquiry given the enquiry's index positioning
      Parameters:
      index - Index positioning of enquiry in list of enquiries
      Returns:
      User identification of enquirer

    • getCampEnquiredID

      public String getCampEnquiredID(int index)

      To be used to ensure only Camp Committee Members and staff of that specific camp can view enquiries

      Camp Name is a unique identification and will be returned to do the check

      Parameters:
      index - Index positioning of enquiry in list of enquiries
      Returns:
      Camp Name that received the enquiry

    • getEnquiryID

      public int getEnquiryID(int index)
      Used by ReplyToStudent to get unique enquiry identification number given newly added index position for an enquiry
      Parameters:
      index - Index positioning of an enquiry
      Returns:
      Unique identification number for a given enquiry

    • getIndexFromID

      public int getIndexFromID(int id)
      Conert unique identification number of an enquiry to its current index positioning in list of enquiries
      Parameters:
      id - Unique identification number of an enquiry
      Returns:
      Index position of enquiry in list of enquiries, if enquiry not found, returns -1 instead

    • printAllEnquiries

      public ArrayList<Integer> printAllEnquiries(String userID, boolean isStaff)

      Used by attendee and staff class to print out all their enquiries

      Returns arraylist containing the indexes of all enquiries, this will allow attendees to edit or delete their enquiries

      Use the return arraylist during console prompt

      Set isStaff to be true to use staff version and false for attendee version

      Parameters:
      userID - User Identification
      isStaff - Indication of whether method is called by a Staff object
      Returns:
      List of unique identification number of enquiries

    • printAllEnquiries

      public ArrayList<Integer> printAllEnquiries(camppackage.Camp camp, user.User self, boolean includeSelf)
      Used by committee member class to print out all their enquiries returns arraylist containing the indexes of all enquiries, this will allow committee member to edit or delete their enquiries using the return arraylist during console prompt Allow toggle to choose if committee member's own enquiry should be printed or not when calling this method
      Parameters:
      camp - Specific camp to print all enquiries for
      self - User object requesting to print all enquiries
      includeSelf - Indication of whether enquiries printed should include enquiries from User object: self
      Returns:

    • printAllEnquiries

      public void printAllEnquiries(String userID)
      For staff UI's use to print out enquiries that have not yet been replied
      Parameters:
      userID - User identification of staff trying to print out enquiries
